EmailTemplate.name: 6253 Retail Showcase Awareness Campaign
EmailTemplate.subject: Austin Modern Learning Community Showcase
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Learn more about our Modern Learning Space
Here's my preheader
Office Depot and National IPA are proud to provide schools with cooperative contracts for Furniture, Office Supplies, and School Supplies.
When it comes to preparing today’s students to be tomorrow’s leaders, learning environments must transcend the confines of the traditional classroom to meet the needs of today’s learners.
That’s why Office Depot is proud to showcase our first in-store Modern Learning Space right here in Austin — a space designed to meet your vision of creating active, flexible, mobile and engaging learning environments.
Make the spaces that make our future.
We’re here to help your school make education more personal, student-driven, active and more in the moment than ever. That’s because we think beyond what’s typical to find unique ways to transform your school and support students’ paths to success — from kindergarten to their careers.
Discover the Committed to Learning difference:
Modern learning environments infused with technology Top-grade furniture from the brands you know and trust Custom-made solutions to fit your unique space requirements And more!
Don’t miss a great learning opportunity. Visit our Modern Learning Space.
See for yourself how our solutions can align with your educational strategies. Learn more about our strategic visioning and project management services — from roadmapping, to scheduling, to full service implementation.
Want to learn more about our Modern Learning Space?
VISIT US ONLINE
Visit our flagship store at 9﻿0﻿7 W﻿e﻿s﻿t F﻿i﻿f﻿t﻿h S﻿t﻿r﻿e﻿e﻿t and you’ll easily see how we can help you get your students moving, thinking and learning in new ways.
